title: Essential MATLAB for Engineers and Scientists 5th c2013 Hahn
description:
Essential MATLAB for Engineers and Scientists, 5th Edition (c2013), textbook by Brian H. Hahn & Daniel T. Valentine.

TEXTBOOK INFO: <a href=" http://store.elsevier.com/Essential-Matlab-for-Engineers-and-Scientists/Brian-Hahn/isbn-9780123943989/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://store.elsevier.com/Essential-Matlab-for-Engineers-and-Scientists/Brian-Hahn/isbn-9780123943989/</a>
(Conforms to release R2012B)

AUDIENCE: First time users of MATLAB. Undergraduates in engineering and science courses that use MATLAB. Any engineer or scientist needing an introduction to MATLAB.

CONTENTS:
---------
PART I - ESSENTIALS:
 Introduction
 MATLAB Fundamentals
 Program Design and Algorithm Development
 MATLAB Functions and Data Import-Export Utilities
 Logical Vectors
 Matrices and Arrays
 Function M-Files
 Loops
 MATLAB Graphics
 Vectors as Arrays and Other Data Structures
 Errors and Pitfalls
PART II - APPLICATIONS:
 Dynamical Systems
 Simulation
 Introduction to Numerical Methods
 Signal Processing
 SIMULINK Toolbox
 Symbolics Toolbox
Appendix A - Syntax Quick Reference
Appendix B - Command and Function Quick Reference
Appendix C - ASCII Character Codes
Appendix D - Solutions to Selected Exercises

FILE INFO: paginated, bookmarked (basic but each chapter opens with an outline), true PDF.
